desText.text: Accessibility is no longer optional — it’s a necessity. Every inaccessible website risks shutting out millions of users, damaging trust, and even facing lawsuits.
With WordPress Site Inspector + AI Agent, accessibility becomes effortless — scan your existing site, get actionable fixes, and stay confidently compliant.
Accessibility isn’t just about compliance — it’s about inclusion, better user experience, and protecting your brand. WPSIA makes it simple and reliable.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Matters Now More Than Ever
accessibility.description: Identify and fix accessibility issues to make your WordPress sites inclusive for all users
accessibility.introText: Our advanced accessibility module scans your WordPress site for WCAG compliance issues and provides actionable recommendations to improve user experience for people with disabilities.

issueLevels.title: Serious Priority Issues
issueLevels.description: Critical accessibility problems that prevent users from accessing content, such as missing alt text, poor contrast, and keyboard navigation barriers.

issueLevels.title: Moderate Priority Issues
issueLevels.description: Issues that may cause difficulties for some users, like inconsistent heading structure, unclear form labels, or missing ARIA attributes.

issueLevels.title: Low Priority Issues
issueLevels.description: Minor issues that could enhance the experience but don't prevent access, such as decorative image labeling or optional suggestions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about WP-Site-Inspector

questions.question: How do I install WP-Site-Inspector?
questions.answer: You can install WP-Site-Inspector directly from the WordPress plugin repository or upload the plugin files to your wp-content/plugins directory. After uploading, simply activate the plugin from your WordPress admin panel.

questions.question: What are the system requirements?
questions.answer: WP-Site-Inspector requires WordPress 5.6 or higher, PHP 7.4 or higher, and at least 256MB of memory. For optimal performance, we recommend PHP 8.0+ and 512MB of memory.

questions.question: Does it work with multisite installations?
questions.answer: Yes, WP-Site-Inspector fully supports WordPress multisite networks. You can activate it network-wide or on individual sites within your network.

questions.question: What types of issues can WP-Site-Inspector detect?
questions.answer: Our plugin detects a wide range of issues including PHP errors, JavaScript conflicts, database problems, security vulnerabilities, performance bottlenecks, and accessibility issues. It also provides AI-powered recommendations for fixes.

questions.question: How does the AI assistance work?
questions.answer: The AI analyzes your code and site structure to provide specific recommendations for improvements. It can suggest optimizations, identify potential conflicts, and even generate code snippets to fix common issues.

questions.question: Can I customize the scanning process?
questions.answer: Yes, you can configure which types of scans to run, set exclusions for specific files or directories, and schedule automated scans at regular intervals.

questions.question: What's the difference between the Free and Pro versions?
questions.answer: The Free version includes basic scanning capabilities with limited AI queries. The Pro version offers unlimited scans, advanced AI recommendations, complete accessibility testing, backup/restore functionality, and priority support.

questions.question: Can I upgrade from Free to Pro later?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade at any time. Your scan history and settings will be preserved when you upgrade to the Pro version.

questions.question: Do you offer discounts for agencies?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer special agency pricing for managing multiple client sites. Contact our sales team for custom agency plans and white-label options.

questions.question: How do I get support?
questions.answer: Free users can access our community forums, while Pro users receive priority email support. All users have access to our comprehensive documentation and knowledge base.

questions.question: What if the plugin conflicts with another plugin?
questions.answer: WP-Site-Inspector is designed to be compatible with most WordPress plugins. If you encounter a conflict, our support team can help you identify and resolve the issue.

questions.question: How often is the plugin updated?
questions.answer: We release regular updates with new features, improvements, and compatibility updates. Pro users receive notifications about new updates and can enable automatic updates.
